TopicTitle: unable to recover or change scenes after crash

Articles.Content: as the title says, every so often after i crash my rocket/plane and break something im unable to recover the pod if it survived and i cant go back to the space center scene, i have to alt f4. ive tried looking at the ksp.log file but i cant make sense of it. anyome else have a similar issue or know the cause?
I have seen similar occurrences and found the cure is to simply hit the ESC key and select space center. and presto your home again.
